Reception Given by Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Swedish Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Swedish Ambassador to the DPRK Paul Beijer hosted a reception Monday evening at the Swedish embassy here on the occasion of the Swedish national day.
 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Kyong Nam, president of University of National Economics who is chairman of the Korea-Sweden Friendship Association,  Kim Yong Jae, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Choe Chang Sik, vice-minister of Public Health, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.    
 Speeches were made at the reception.

Chairman of South Side's Prep. Com. for Joint Functions and His Party Leave
articles.content:
Chairman of South Side's Prep. Com. for Joint Functions and His Party Leave
    Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Paek Rak Chong, chairman of the south side's preparatory committee for joint functions of Koreans in the north, the south
and overseas to implement the June 15 joint declaration, and his party left here Tuesday.
 They were seen off at the airport by An Kyong Ho, chairman of the north side's preparatory committee for the joint functions, and officials concerned.
